mapper.select: SELECT id, description, is_completed, is_fixed, created_at, updated_at, completed_at FROM todo WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, description, is_completed, is_fixed, created_at, updated_at, completed_at FROM todo ORDER BY is_fixed DESC, id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE todo SET description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE todo SET is_completed = #{isCompleted}, completed_at = CASE WHEN #{isCompleted} THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END WHERE id = #{id}
